Production of cigarettes and pesticides add to GDP
Higher expenses to treat lung disease, diabetes, obesity add to GDP…
Higher expenses to clean up an oil spill add to GDP…
Production of cigarettes and pesticides add to GDP
Higher GDP levels achieved in this way do not represent an improvement in the well being of the country, quite the contrary they represent a decline in welfare.
